extlink_i Class Reference

Collaboration diagram for extlink_i:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Iterator over a list of extents.

Constructor latches the given extent-map page. Get() methods unlatch and latch extent-map pages as needed to return a reference to the needed extlink_t.
